item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: Customizing It would be pretty lame if that was it, wouldn’t it? Fear not, you can tinker with it to make it your own. Side Notes: We all know why you’re here: the sidenotes. This is rather easy. Just make sure you have the tufte package installed and then, in an inline r chunk, wherever you want to put a side note call the following. tufte::margin_note("This is a margin note") The above produces the following: ⊕This is a margin note
